title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.6 - Littering and dumping rubbish and refuse
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1045.6 - Littering and dumping rubbish and refuse

State Regulations

No person shall litter in the transit center or bus. All
persons shall use receptacles provided for the disposal of refuse. No bulk
refuse generated or collected on property outside the jurisdiction of MSBA may
be taken into, dumped within or carried through the transit center or bus or
deposited in any receptacle in the transit center or bus. Trash and other waste
materials contained in waste receptacles within the transit center shall not be
removed except by persons duly authorized by the transit center
manager. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1045.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
